comments.body: Although I wouldn't bother with this kind of change, it's OK here IMHO
These change the logic slightly -- are you sure it's equivalent?

Tested it locally (and can't wait to see the results from Jenkins).

The current code _overly_ assumes that the times can be `0` (which cannot...ever). It is also more clearer that at `hasCompleted` `processingEndTime` is already set. It's over-complicated as it's now IMHO.
